page.title: 01Cheriton Fitz._ Introduction
page.content: INTRODUCTION. This block is a rural area, it has a lot of farms. There are about two squares of residential area which is {Cheriton Fitzpaine}itself.Cheriton is a lively village it has a friendly atmosphere and lots of things happen,like the carnival.The other small residential areas are{Stockleigh {English}and{East Village.}There isn't much unemployment in the villages but it is hard to get a job.Many people work on farms but most of the employed work in Exeter,a few of them going to Tiverton or Crediton.There are quite a lot of builders here like the Martin Bros.,the Whites and the partnership between T.Harvey and B.Tucker. Cheriton Fitzpaine has a village store,a Post Office,a saddlers and a blacksmith which is going to reopen soon.
